Sentencas: SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3-delta is a controversial material whether it is used as an oxygen permeable membrane or as a cathode of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Remarkable dependence of electrochemical performance of SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3-δ on A-site nonstoichiometry

Sentencas: In this paper, carefully synthesized powders of perovskite-type SrxCo0.8Fe0.2O3-delta (x = 0.80-1.20) oxides are utilized to investigate the effect of A-site nonstoichiometry on their electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Remarkable dependence of electrochemical performance of SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3-δ on A-site nonstoichiometry

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity, sintering property and stability in ambient air of SrxCo0.8Fe0.2O3-delta are critically dependent on the A-site nonstoichiometry.
Titulo: Remarkable dependence of electrochemical performance of SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3-δ on A-site nonstoichiometry

Sentencas: Sr1.00Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta has a single-phase cubic perovskite structure, but a cobalt-iron oxide impurity appears in A-site cation deficient samples and Sr-3(Co, Fe)(2)O7-delta appears when there is an A-site cation excess.
Titulo: Remarkable dependence of electrochemical performance of SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3-δ on A-site nonstoichiometry

Sentencas: It was found that the presence of the cobalt-iron oxide improves the electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Remarkable dependence of electrochemical performance of SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3-δ on A-site nonstoichiometry

Sentencas: However, Sr-3(Co, Fe)(2)O7-delta has a significant negative influence on the electrochemical activity for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Remarkable dependence of electrochemical performance of SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3-δ on A-site nonstoichiometry

Sentencas: The peak power densities with a single-layer Sr1.00Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta cathode are 275, 475, 749 and 962 mW cm(-2) at 550, 600, 650 and 700 degrees C, respectively, values which are slightly lower than those for Sr0.95Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta (e.g. 1025 mW cm(-2) at 700 degrees C) but much higher than those for Sr1.05Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta (e.g. only 371 mW cm(-2) at 700 degrees C).
Titulo: Remarkable dependence of electrochemical performance of SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3-δ on A-site nonstoichiometry

Sentencas: This remarkable dependence of electrochemical performance of the SrxCo0.8Fe0.2O3-delta cathode on the A-site nonstoichiometry reveals that lower values of electrochemical activity reported in the literature may be induced by an A-site cation excess.
Titulo: Remarkable dependence of electrochemical performance of SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3-δ on A-site nonstoichiometry

Sentencas: Therefore, to obtain a high performance of SrxCo0.8Fe0.2O3-delta cathode for IT-SOFCs, an A-site cation excess must be avoided.
Titulo: Remarkable dependence of electrochemical performance of SrCo0.8Fe0.2O3-δ on A-site nonstoichiometry
